text: Mount Aragats () is the highest point in Armenia. It is in the province of Aragatsotn, northwest from Yerevan. It is a standalone extinct stratovolcano with four main peaks forming the rim of the crater. It is a popular destination for local alpinists. ==Related pages== *Lake Kari == Other websites == *Mount Aragats at ArmeniaPedia.org Category:Mountains of Asia Category:Geography of Armenia
title: Mount Aragats
